name: One-shoulder bubble-hem dress
details: Short, fitted, one-shoulder dress in woven fabric with gathers at the top and one short balloon sleeve. Concealed zip at one side and a gently flared skirt with a bubble hem. Jersey lining.

name: Ruffled off the shoulder dress
details: Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with ruffles at the top, a smocked section at the back and a concealed zip with hook-and-eye fastening at one side. Visible seams down the front and back. Lined.

name: Tie-belt shirt dress
details: Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and short raglan sleeves. Waist section with narrow elastication at the back, gathers at the front and back and a detachable tie belt.

name: Tapered-waist dress
details: Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Tapered waist with pleats that create gentle draping. Unlined.

name: Balloon-sleeved wrap dress
details: Calf-length dress in woven fabric made from a viscose and cotton blend with a fitted bodice that has a V-shaped neckline and a wrapover front. Seam at the waist with pleats at the front, long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

name: Blazer wrap dress
details: Short, fitted, sleeveless blazer dress in woven fabric with a shawl collar. Wrapover front with draping at the waist, a concealed button at one side and wide ties at the other. Unlined.

name: Cold shoulder maxi dress
details: Long cold shoulder dress in sheer, woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the top. Gathered seams for added width. Partly lined.

name: Pleated blouse
details: Blouse in a pleated weave with a round, drawstring neckline and a V-shaped opening at the front. Loose fit with dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Overlocked hem.

name: Long-sleeved top
details: Short, fitted top in soft jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem.

name: Oversized T-shirt
details: Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline and low dropped shoulders.
color: Description: Light grey marl, Solid color

name: Boat-neck cotton top
details: Loose-fit top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

name: Boxy-style printed T-shirt
details: Boxy-style T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey. Ribbed trim around the neckline and dropped shoulders.
color: Description: Cream/Black/Blue/Red/Yellow/White, Disney, Mickey Mouse, horse, Mickey Mouse, Disney

name: Loose-fit polo shirt
details: Loose-fit polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar and an open placket in woven fabric. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem.

name: Embroidery-detail polo shirt
details: Oversized polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar and concealed button placket in twill. Embroidered text motif on the chest, dropped shoulders, long, cuffed sleeves and a straight-cut hem with a slit at each side.
color: Description: Black/White, Sport studios, New York, Block-coloured

name: Draped jersey top
details: Short, fitted top in stretch jersey with a cowl neckline, long sleeves and gathered side seams to create a draped effect.

name: Skinny High Jeans
details: 5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a skinny fit from the waist to the hem. High waist with a zip fly and button.

name: Wide High Jeans
details: 5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.
color: Description: Light denim blue, Solid colour

name: Slim Straight High Ankle Jeans
details: 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in slightly stretchy cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, ankle-length legs.

name: Straight Jeans
details: 5-pocket jeans in sturdy denim made from a cotton and viscose blend. High waist, a button fly and straight legs.

name: Wide Turn-Up Jeans
details: 5-pocket jeans in cotton denim with a regular waist and a zip fly and button. Wide legs with creases down the front and back and a wide turn-up at the hems.

name: Wide High Cropped Jeans
details: Jeans in cotton denim with a slight stretch for good comfort. Wide leg with a regular fit from the waist to the hip and a wide cut from the thigh to the hem. High waist with a zip fly and button. Patch back pockets. Cropped length, designed to hit above the ankle bone and show the ankle. The wide-leg jean is a wardrobe essential.
color: Description: Dark denim blue, Solid color.

name: Teddy sports gilet
details: Sports gilet in soft, warming teddy with elasticated bindings. Regular fit with a high collar, zip down the front, zipped chest pocket, open side pockets and a rounded hem that is longer at the back. Unlined.

name: Mid layer jacket
details: Jacket in stretchy jersey with a soft brushed inside that can be worn as it is or as an insulating mid layer. Regular fit with a lined hood and a zip down the front with an anti-chafe chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with thumbholes, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets for safe storage of valuables. Unlined.

name: Hybrid down jacket with ThermoMove
details:
H&M Premium Selection
Hybrid jacket in stretchy fabric and padded panels in functional fabric made with ThermoMove that keeps you warm when the temperature drops. Regular fit with a lined hood and a zip down the front with an anti-chafe chin guard. Extra-long raglan sleeves with a thumbhole at the cuffs, open inner pockets and zipped side pockets for safe storage of valuables. Elasticated trims around the hood, cuffs and hem. The jacket has a down and feather filling. Lined.

name: Cropped Sports vest top in DryMove
details:
H&M Premium Selection
Hybrid jacket in stretchy fabric and padded panels in functional fabric made with ThermoMove that keeps you warm when the temperature drops. Regular fit with a lined hood and a zip down the front with an anti-chafe chin guard. Extra-long raglan sleeves with a thumbhole at the cuffs, open inner pockets and zipped side pockets for safe storage of valuables. Elasticated trims around the hood, cuffs and hem. The jacket has a down and feather filling. Lined.

name: Sports leggings in DryMove
details: Sports leggings in DryMove functional fabric that helps to wick away moisture from your skin, keeping you comfortably dry while you move. High waist with a wide waist panel containing a concealed mobile phone pocket at the back.
color: Description: Dark khaki green, Solid color

name: Sports cycling shorts
details: Knee-length sports cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. High waist with a wide waist panel containing a concealed pocket for safe storage of valuables.

name: Oversized sports sweatshirt
details: Oversized top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a fast-drying function. Round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

name: Oversized sports hoodie
details: Oversized sports hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Lined hood with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
color: Description: Grey marl/Black, Active Sports Club

name: Cropped sweatshirt
details: Cropped top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Regular fit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long, voluminous sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

name: Fringed shoulder bag
details: Shoulder bag in coated fabric with a zip at the top, strap and metal buckle at the front and a short shoulder strap. Long fringes attached to the zip pull and shoulder strap. Taffeta lining.
length: Size: Depth: 36.0 cm, Width: 7.0 cm, Height: 36.0 cm

name: Bucket bag
details: Bucket bag in napped fabric featuring a wide, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and a concealed magnetic fastener at the top. Depth 17 cm. Width 27 cm. Height 32 cm.
